ThingDef.label: Land's Wrath
ThingDef.description: A mysterious archotech device that pulsates a primal frequency. Can be activated without limit to drive all nearby untamed animals mad. While mostly harmless to humans, the pulse may also irritate nearby humans temporairly.

ThingDef.label: Zeus Cannon
ThingDef.description: An advanced ultratech weapon capable of launching a rapid volley of terrifying lightning bolts.

ThingDef.label: Mech Signaller
ThingDef.description:
An ancient military targeting device that signals an orbital platform to deploy a random squad of friendly mechanoids.
The device can used indefinitely, though its age causes it to require constant maintenance.

ThingDef.label: psychic insanity lance
ThingDef.description: A limited-use psychic effector. It overwhelms the target's mind with terrifying perceptual distortions, driving them into a berserk state. There is a risk of brain damage. It has a long range, but requires line of sight.

ThingDef.label: Orb of Madness
ThingDef.description: A cursed orb touched by the void. Peering into the orb at someone causes even the psychically immunue to go insane. However, the orb has been known to sometimes inflict the same madness on its user. The orb occasionally needs to be refuelled with exotic materials.

ThingDef.label: Ethereal Cloak
ThingDef.description: An ancient, threadbear cloak constructed by a long forgotten civilization. The wearer of the cloak becomes invisible, but their ability to interact with this plane of reality becomes limited.

HediffDef.label: Impermenance
HediffDef.description: The user is invisible to most observers, but their ability to interact within this world is greatly limited.

HediffDef.label: Impermenance
HediffDef.description: The user is invisible to most observers, but their ability to interact within this world is greatly limited. (note: since you don't have Royalty DLC, it just makes the user really hard to damage).

ThingDef.description: A robe worn by Ninjas. Not intended for player use.
ThingDef.label: Ninja Garment
cannon
ThingDef.description: A weapon representing an enemy mortar. Not intended for player use.

ThingDef.label: RocketLauncher
ThingDef.description: A weapon representing a rocket complex. Not intended for player use.

ThingDef.label: Chain Vulcan
ThingDef.description: An advanced weapon originally designed as a spaceship armament. It has a long warmup phase, but can be fired continuously once charged.

ThingDef.label: Infinity Gun
ThingDef.description: Standard issue rifle of ultratech snipers. Even without AI combat modules, this rifle can shoot extremely far.

ThingDef.label: Radiance of the Sun
ThingDef.description: A massive weapon capable of blanketing entire towns with flames.

ThingDef.label: Blessing of the Sun
ThingDef.description: This pawn has the blessing of a mysterious power. They can shoot powerful flames from their hands.

ThingDef.label: lightbeam
ThingDef.description: A powerful ultratech weapon that fires an extremely rapid, concentrated stream of bullets at a target.

ThingDef.label: Thorhammer
ThingDef.description: A warhammer with an embedded ultratech device that summons lightning strikes on impact. The warhammer shields the user from some of the impact of the flames.

ThingDef.label: Fire Cloak
ThingDef.description: A full-body garment worn by fire cultists. It gives immense protection of heat. Not intended for player use (unless recruited a fire cultist).

ThingDef.label: Ethereal Belt
ThingDef.description: A worn cloak of lost construction. Allows the user to phase through walls at will through some localized quantum tunneling mumble jumble. Greatly consumes the user's energy reserves to do so.\n\n[Note: requires Vanilla Expanded to work.]

HediffDef.label: Ghost Type
HediffDef.description: This pawn is a ghost type; They can walk through walls in dungeons but get hungry much quicker.

ThingDef.label: Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch
ThingDef.description: ...And Saint Attila raised the hand grenade up on high, saying, "O LORD, bless this Thy hand grenade, that with it Thou mayest blow Thine enemies to tiny bits, in Thy mercy." And the LORD did grin, and the people did feast upon the lambs and sloths and carp and anchovies and orangutans and breakfast cereals, and fruit bats and large chu... [At this point, the friar is urged by Brother Maynard to "skip a bit, brother"]... And the LORD spake, saying, "First shalt thou take out the Holy Pin. Then shalt thou count to three, no more, no less. Three shall be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, neither count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out! Once the number three, being the third number, be reached, then lobbest thou thy Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch towards thy foe, who, being naughty in My sight, shall snuff it."

ThingDef.label: Glitched Belt
ThingDef.description: A belt of Ultratech origin that allows the user to warp into locations at well. Without its original owner, the ring has glitched however, causing the user to randomly teleport from place to place.

HediffDef.label: Glitched Reality
HediffDef.description: This pawn's position and momentum is unstable. They may randomly teleport to a random nearby location, but their positional instability reduces the effect of attacks against them.

ThingDef.label: Pandora's Box
ThingDef.description: What's inside the box?

ThingDef.label: Realitybreaker
ThingDef.description: An artifact imbued with the fury of Gaia. Causes all untamed animals to go into a berserk state. Can be activated infinitely.

ThingDef.label: Madness Cloak
ThingDef.description: A cloak that allows you to phase through walls through some localized quantum tunneling mumble jumble. Walking through walls however drastically increases the user's hunger.

HediffDef.label: Lost Mercy
HediffDef.description: This pawn has become aware of many more things.

li.label: Lost Mercy
li.description: The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents.

ThingDef.label: Rare Good
ThingDef.description: A valuable but fragile item. Each can be sold for a lot of money.
